Description copied from interface: AssetInfo
Returns true if this AssetInfo has the same properties as the given info.

Specified by:
isMatch in interface AssetInfo
Overrides:

getProperties

public String[] getProperties()
Description copied from interface: AssetInfo
Returns the name of all properties available for this AssetInfo.

Specified by:
getProperties in interface AssetInfo
Overrides:
getProperties in class BaseAssetInfo
Returns:
The reference to the properties available for this AssetInfo. This should not be modified externally, any modifications will be made globally and will affect other callers of this method.
